original: intros f b a x H. unfold ex_lim in H. destruct H as [l Hlim]. apply ex_lim_comp_lin with (a:=a) (b:=b) (x:=x) (l:=l). apply Hlim. intros contra. apply Rmult_integral in contra. destruct contra as [contra | contra]. apply Rgt_not_eq in contra. apply contra. apply Rlt_not_eq in contra. apply contra.
